channel.title: Nooooooo what happens when sombody knows youre ip and all youre info?
channel.description: ok i was on irc and sombody got all of my info by hacking me....does anybody know what they can do with that?please help!!!!!!!

item.title: Nooooooo what happens when sombody knows youre ip and all youre info?
item.dc:creator: @liamsford liamsford
item.description:
@liamsford wrote:

~8ballcrazy~:

o it was kind of wierd cause he got personal info i think cause he got y ip wich is like 71.whatever then he got the other part wich is like h.d.w comcast.net-45-234-67-45-4-5 and thats what i see at top of rs2 screen when i start out and its at top

It’s Ok dude. ALL smfforfree2.com forums that you have sighed up for are like that. THe admins can see all that INFO.

item.title: Nooooooo what happens when sombody knows youre ip and all youre info?
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

[quote=“shangtsung1, post:2, topic:64121”]ddos you?
flood you

thats about it lol
you can ring your isp too chanmge your ip :P[/quote]

Why ring your ISP? Just unplug the Modem from the computer and router then plug it back in, BAM new IP.

Also who wants to hack you? If you have ever gone on a webpage someone has your details - stop worrying cause then you will get all caught up in firewall’s, security & more.

*Also they cannot key log you reason being is that a key logger is an application installed on your computer & if it was installed an anti-virus should pick it up damn fast.

Read full topic
